response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe is an absolute game-changer in its field. It's not just a product; it's a solution that can transform your business and bring significant value to your operations. Given its immense worth, valued at $1,000,000 to you, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price.

To make this deal even more attractive, I am extending a special offer of $950,000 for you to consider. This is a limited-time offer, and I encourage you to respond promptly so we can discuss the details further and ensure a smooth transaction.

Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
